item.title: Start a Cybersecurity Career Without a Degree
item.author: muratkurkoglu@gmail.com (Murat Kurkoglu)
item.description: No degree? No problem. Learn how to start a cybersecurity career through self-learning, certifications, and hands-on skills. A roadmap for beginners.
